pages.title: Spell Locate
pages.text: $(br)When holding a specific $(bold)key item$() in your $(bold)offhand$(), casting $(key)Spell Locate$() on a $(key)Lodestone$() can locate special $(bold)structures/biomes$().$(br2)$(welcome/emi#ru)Check uses$() on a $(key)Lodestone$() to see all recipes, or $(welcome/emi#search)search$() for the $(bold)structure/biome$() name directly.$(br2)A $(key)Lodestone$() that gets hit has a $(bold)30%$() chance to break.

pages.title: Spell Summon
pages.text: $(br)When holding a specific $(bold)key item$() in your $(bold)offhand$(), casting $(key)Spell Summon$() on a $(mechanic/spawner)spawner$() can summon special mobs.$(br2)$(welcome/emi#ru)Check uses$() on a $(mechanic/spawner)spawner$() to see all recipes.$(br2)Some bosses can also be summoned with $(key)Spell Summon$(), but you must be in the place where they $(bold)normally appear$() $(t:e.g. Stalker must be summoned in the Otherworld).

pages.title: Remote Manipulation
pages.text: $(br)Casting $(key)Remote Manipulation$() releases a spell that $(bold)uses$() the item you are holding in your $(bold)offhand$() when it touches a block.$(br2)You can use $(key)Remote Manipulation$() to place blocks from a distance.$(br2)This spell can bypass some restrictions, such as $(mechanic/hostility#arena)Domain Suppression$().

pages.title: Remote Destruction
pages.text: $(br)Casting $(key)Remote Destruction$() releases a spell that $(bold)breaks$() a block when it touches it, and drops what it would normally drop.$(br2)You can use $(key)Remote Destruction$() to break some blocks that cannot be mined normally.$(br2)This spell can bypass some restrictions, such as $(mechanic/hostility#arena)Domain Suppression$().
